Plot:
======
Kassie is a smart, fun-loving single woman who despite her slightly neurotic best friend Wally's objections, decides it's time to have a baby -even if it means doing it by herself... with a little help from a charming sperm donor. But Kassie's plans go awry because of a last-minute switch that isn't discovered until seven years later when Wally finally gets acquainted with Kassie's precocious - though slightly neurotic - son.
